title: South Necropolis (Pergamon)
description: An extensive Roman necropolis, with burials stretching back to at least the Hellenistic age, lies south and southwest of the so-called "Red Hall basilica" beneath the modern Turabey Mahallesi neighborhood of Bergama, Turkey.

properties.description: Centerpoint of the more westerly of two thus-labeled polygonal features from Pergamon Digital Map. Dates after Pirson 2023.

properties.description: Centerpoint of the more easterly of two thus-labeled polygonal features from Pergamon Digital Map. Dates after Pirson 2023.
